name: nighthawk
description: A client-side wrapper for the Express router

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && npm run build && npm run minify && npm run gzip
scripts.disc: mkdir -p dist && npm run build-dev && npm run minify && discify dist/nighthawk.min.js -O && npm run gzip && npm run size
scripts.build-dev: browserify index.js --full-paths -u buffer -u url -u util -u process -o dist/nighthawk.js
scripts.example-basic: cd example/basic && npm install && npm run browserify && npm run start
scripts.example-basedir: cd example/base-dir && npm install && npm run browserify && npm run start
scripts.example-redirect: cd example/redirect && npm install && npm run browserify && npm run start

author: Wes Todd
